title: KRCL Notification 2025 - Walk - in interview for 04 Junior Technical Assistant Posts
description: The Konkan Railway Corporation Limited (KRCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Assistant Electrical Engineer, Junior Technical Assistant, and Assistant Mechanical Engineer Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the KRCL Notification 2025 . The ...
